item.title: Why The Windows Secure Boot Hack Is a Good Thing - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Why The Windows Secure Boot Hack Is a Good Thing - Bitcoinist.net

If you even casually follow security news, you're aware that the key governing Microsoft Secure Boot has been found, exploited, and Secure Boot as a "feature" has been rendered meaningless. I'm here to tell you that this is a good thing.

item.title: Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project | HolyTransaction

French airplane firm Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project, or the Linux Foundation blockchain-related program. Last year Airbus sold more than 1,000 aircraft and now the company is joining the same blockchain project that also sees the participation of firms such as IBM, Red Hat, Intel and JPMorgan.

item.title: Warning! Next Bitcoin Core Version Could be Hacked, Reads Advisory
item.description:
Warning! Next Bitcoin Core Version Could be Hacked, Reads Advisory

The next version of Bitcoin Core, a popular digital wallet for the cryptocurrency, could be hacked and replaced with a malicious look-alike by state sponsored actors, reads a safety warning. On 17 August, open-source project Bitcoin.org announced the threat on its website.

item.title: Chainalysis: More Ransomware Arrests Are Coming - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Chainalysis: More Ransomware Arrests Are Coming - Bitcoin News

Ransomware has been on the rise as of late, and it is a cyber security threat a lot of businesses and government services are taking seriously. According to Chainalysis, the blockchain monitoring company, more ransomware-related arrests from law enforcement are on the horizon.

item.title: New Snowden documents confirm leaked NSA tools are real
item.description:
New Snowden documents confirm leaked NSA tools are real

Newly released documents from the Edward Snowden archive, published today by The Intercept , confirm what was already suspected this week: some of the NSA's secret malware is out in the open. 16-character string matches up On Saturday, a group going by the name "the Shadow Brokers" began leaking what it said were NSA exploits and scripts.

item.title: Bitcoin Usage Fuels Ransomware Attacks | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Bitcoin Usage Fuels Ransomware Attacks | PYMNTS.com

As the instances and threat of ransomware continues to wreak havoc on both businesses, governments and individuals around the world, it seems as though bitcoin has found itself closely intertwined with the malicious software. As The Wall Street Journal pointed out on Friday (Aug.

item.title: Blockchain Lead Vacates Position at UBS, Joins BNY Mellon
item.description:
Blockchain Lead Vacates Position at UBS, Joins BNY Mellon

The Swiss bank, UBS, is a losing a key member of its administrative team in Alex Batlin, who lead the bank's efforts in blockchain innovation. Also read: TrumpCoin is Real, But Will It Make Crypto Great Again? The news was first reported and confirmed by Financial News, which cites an internal memo dated August 17th.

item.title: Bitcoin Ponzi Schemer Hints at Dealings With Mt Gox CEO - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Ponzi Schemer Hints at Dealings With Mt Gox CEO - CoinDesk

Convicted Ponzi scheme operator Trendon Shavers is now insinuating the major unidentified debtor cited in his defense against the SEC was Mark Karpeles, CEO of the now-defunct bitcoin exchange Mt Gox.

item.title: Can ACTUS Stop Financial Crises with Blockchain Data Standards?
item.description:
Can ACTUS Stop Financial Crises with Blockchain Data Standards?

The lack of global financial industry data standards for financial instruments has created chaos for digital currency startups and the financial sector as a whole. Even more devastating is the intensification effect this lack of standards has had during recent financial crises.

item.title: LEOcoin Foundation Releases Full White Paper for New Token
item.description:
LEOcoin Foundation Releases Full White Paper for New Token

The LEOcoin Foundation has released a full white paper for its digital currency, which details development so far as well as outlining a roadmap for future progress.
